description:
Original Release Date: December 1990. 
Join Dr. Mario for intense puzzle challenges! 
Mario throws multi-shaded vitamin capsules into a bottle that contains an ugly variety of nasty viruses. You can move, shift, or spin the capsules as they fall. Arrange them to align with other capsules on top of a virus. If you can get 4 or more of the same shade in a row, POOF! They disappear! Destroy all of the viruses in the bottle and you progress to the next round where things get even more difficult.
With Dr. Mario, there are many germs that are fun to catch!
name: Dr. Mario™
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
